attributes.action: Introduce a vegan inclusive food wheel in schools when educating pupils on diet.
attributes.additional_details: I do not want my child to sit in a lesson where they are taught false information that their vegan diet is incorrect or incomplete. It is a viable and healthy choice that can sustain a human of any age therefore the food wheel should be inclusive for all diets not just meat eaters alone.
attributes.background: Remove dairy as a necessary food group as unless an infant, breast milk is not needed. A protein section instead of a meat only title, with vegan proteins included.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for specific teaching resources used by schools.

The NHS's eatwell gudie includes non-diary alternatives, which you can see here

https://www.nhs.uk/live-well/eat-well/the-eatwell-guide/
